step_feedback.feedback: For step 1, try to keep your wrists more stable and closer to your body. Focus on the shoulder movement.
In step 2, your left elbow is moving a bit too much. Aim to keep your elbows relatively still while rolling your shoulders.
For step 3, ensure your wrists remain steady. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down smoothly.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to keep your wrists steady and focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to help with breathing.
